Class OServerPluginAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orientechnologies.orient.server.plugin.OServerPluginAbstract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OService, OServerPlugin
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OAutomaticBackup, ODistributedAbstractPlugin, OETLPlugin, OGraphServerHandler, OJMXPlugin, OLiveQueryPlugin, OMailPlugin, OProxyServer, OrientTokenHandler, OServerHandlerAbstract, OServerSideScriptInterpreter

    public abstract class OServerPluginAbstract
extends Object
implements OServerPlugin
    Abstract class to make OServerHandler implementation easier.
    Author:
    Luca Garulli (l.garulli--at--orientechnologies.com)
